comment: A class is not empty if and only if it has at least one element. Proposition 5.17(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. This version of ~ neq0 requires only that ` x ` not be free in, rather than not occur in, ` A ` . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jul-2021.)
